𓏥 III Terminal symbol for plural nouns, verbs etc

𓏥 𒈨𒌍 MEŠ suffix/prefix 𓄟𓂓𓄛

𓏥 𒈨𒌍 MEŠ < MENTS 𓏛𓏥 : 𓇋𓊪𓅱𓏛𓏥 payments

𓄟 𓇓 𓇳 𓏥 Mes-su-ra-(im) Mizraim (≈Ramessians) Hebraic plural

-𒀀𒀀𒄑𒍣 •-a-a-iz-zi •mas (noun marker)

𓏥 standard reading 'w' 𓅱𓍢𓏲 alternative: -wns -ons -en -es -e -𓏲 (plural suffixes)
